message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value in its category. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering this, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. I understand that this might seem higher than what you're expecting, but I assure you, it reflects the true worth and benefits of owning this product. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way we can make this offer more appealing to you.
